sections.objective:
Final year Computer Science student at Manchester Metropolitan University projected to achieve a 1st class degree.
Keen interests in full-stack development, artificial intelligence and machine learning. Seeking graduate roles to help
expand my knowledge and gain valuable experience as a developer.
sections.education:
GCSE and A-Level Computer Science, Chatham and Clarendon Grammar School 2015 - 2019
BSc (Hons) Computer Science, Manchester Metropolitan 2021 - 2025
• Completed modules including Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Operating Sys-
tems, Software Development Processes, Mathematics for Computing, Databases, Computer Ar-
chitecture and Web Development. Consistently achieving 70% or higher in each module, attaining a
first-class performance.
• Developed proficiency in a diverse set of programming languages, including C#, Java, Python, JavaScript,
TypeScript, Visual Basic, C and Go through hands-on experience gained in modules. Additionally, gained
expertise in agile development methodologies and participated in peer reviews, contributing to a
well-rounded skill set.
• Applied theoretical knowledge in practical settings by actively participating in team projects. Demonstrated
strong teamwork skills and leadership capabilities, successfully leading projects to completion.
sections.skills:
Programming Languages & Technologies: C#, Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Visual Basic, C, Go
Frameworks, Libraries & Tools: Node.js, React.js, Next.js, Redux, Scikit-learn, Numpy, Pandas
Development & Collaboration Tools: Visual Studio, VS Code, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Git, Vercel
sections.projects:
AI CV Generator. Built a CV generator site using AI by using React.JS, Node.JS, Tailwind CSS and Open AI’s
GPT 3.5 Model API. Helps users input basic information about their skills and previous roles and allows GPT 3.5
Model to generate the bulk of the CV. Landed my brother a role using the CV generated. (Live site/Github repo)
Portfolio Website. Built a portfolio site using Next.JS, Typescript, Tailwind CSS and Sanity CMS. This project
was fundamental to solidifying my front-end skills whilst also using a Sanity, a content management system, for
seamless changes to the site content of the website. (Live site/Github repo)
Twitter Clone Built a twitter clone social media application using Next.JS, Node.JS, MongoDB Atlas and Vercel.
With this project I gained valuable experience using a NoSQL database service such as MongoDB Atlas to store user
information creating API endpoints using Node.JS. This project also utilized the JAMStack (Javascript, API’s and
Markup) standards to help create a reusable, fast and modern web application.(Github repo)
sections.experience:

revenue for the company during the COVID era.
• Demonstrated adept troubleshooting skills under pressure to address and resolve various IT issues promptly.
